cards.rules_text:
Reveal the top X cards of your library. For each card revealed this way, flip a coin.
[b]Heads |[/b] Exile that card. You may play that card without paying its mana cost for as long as it remains exiled.
[b]Tails |[/b] Exile that card. You may play that card until end of turn.

Ransom the top X cards of your library. If X is 5 or more, until end of turn, you may cast ransomed creature cards you own in exile without paying their mana costs. [i](To ransom a card, exile it. Its owner may pay {3} at any time to return it to their hand.)[/i]

Spells and permanents you control have lifelink.
When Charan, Wildflame Prodigy enters the battlefield, if it was cast for its spectacle cost, destroy all other creatures.

Chimera Ultimus enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
As Chimera Ultimus enters the battlefield, choose up to X of deathtouch, flying, haste, prowess, reach, trample, and vigilance, put a counter of each type chosen this way onto Chimera Ultimus.

You may activate signature abilities of creatures you control any number of times each turn.

[-7]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a creature an opponent controls that was dealt damage by a creature you control this turn dies, draw a card.” Then, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. Each creature you control fights each creature you don't control.
